name: La combinaison
description:
Type : It's a mini reflexion game from French TV show "Fort Boyard". 

Description :

In this game you need to find the right combination. You have 3 blue balls ans 2 white balls. Click on balls to change colors. When you finished, push the button "Verification", in order to check your answer. The counter will show you how many blue balls are correctly positionned. Be careful you have only 3 trials.  

Framework : Monogame

Language : C#.

Develop Time : 10 hours  

Music : Feels - Patrick Patrikios
